name: BARBEERIAN
description:
A devious sorcerer tricked you, as they do, and now you must fight your way out of a dungeon... while absolutely hammered.

BARBEERIAN was made in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK GameJAM. It was inspired by the jam's theme, "Out of Control," with a mind-bending and constantly-changing control scheme. You are in possession of a magic vessel (beer glass) that grants incredible power, but in exchange you lose nearly all muscular coordination. It will take extreme concentration to bumble your way out of this nightmare.

Big thanks to Mark Brown of GMTK for running this jam, and Itch.io for hosting.

Concept, Programming & Art by: Sam Balcomb
Sound Design, Music & Testing by: Jeff Dodson
